events.title: Nor'easter - January 2026
events.description: Major nor'easter expected to impact the Northeast United States with heavy snow, strong winds, and coastal flooding starting January 28.
impacts: Heavy snow accumulations of 8-16 inches in eastern New England
Blizzard conditions possible along the coast
Coastal flooding during high tide cycles
events.seoTitle: Nor'easter January 2026 Live Tracker | Real-Time Alerts & Radar
events.seoDescription: Track the January 2026 nor'easter in real-time. Live weather alerts, radar, and snow forecasts for New England and Mid-Atlantic states.

events.title: Winter Storm Fern
events.description: Winter Storm Fern brought heavy snow and significant ice accumulations across the Southern Plains and Mid-South, causing widespread power outages and travel disruptions.
impacts: Heavy snow of 6-12 inches across Texas, Oklahoma, and Arkansas
Significant ice accumulations up to 0.5 inches
Dangerous travel conditions for several days
events.seoTitle: Winter Storm Fern Live Tracker | Real-Time Alerts & Updates
events.seoDescription: Track Winter Storm Fern in real-time. Live weather alerts, radar, and snow/ice totals across the Southern US.
